text_block_list.text:
One day in the early afternoon, in front of the school gate, 
I saw a Uma Musume looking around for something…
choice_data_list: What's wrong? Are you looking for something?

text_block_list.text:
Oh… Thank you very much. 
You're a person of triumphant wind. 
Umm… Do you know about Shinato?

It's Shinato. Daruma-san encountered Akarashima 
and became a cherry blossom in a storm…

That's why, I'm looking for Shinato, 
but I don't know where it is.
choice_data_list: Sorry, I have no idea what you are talking about…

text_block_list.text:
Oh, I see. It's the wind and rain of the rainy season. 
Sorry for taking up your time.

I'm in a bit of a hurry, so please excuse me. 
Thank you very much, person of the triumphant wind.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Well, I don't think you have to worry about her. 
Zephyr san is always like that.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Her personality is somewhat strange, but I don't 
think she's a bad person. It just seems like she 
doesn't feel like getting along with people.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, she's always going by her own pace, 
so if you worry about her too much you'll get 
tired of being swayed around by her words

After saying that, the two girls left. Zephyr was certainly 
a mysterious Uma Musume. I didn't quite understand 
what she was saying. But…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
…Are you ok Daruma-san? 
Please hold on for a while.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
You are… the person of the triumphant wind? 
Were you looking for me?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Ah… You're not only like a triumphant wind, but also the 
kind of person who sets sail in the calm wind. But thank you.

Zephyr was crouching by a large tree and was staring 
at her feet. There was a wild bird in her line of sight.

No matter how hard I look at it, I don't see a Daruma-san. 
All I can see is the bird. It seems like the bird is 
injured. That must mean…
choice_data_list: So you want to treat the injured bird?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right. That's why I thought about Shinato, 
but everyone seemed to be in 'calm wind'. I was wondering 
if it was an easterly wind or a southerly wind.

I still cannot understand what she is talking about, 
but there is no doubt that the bird is injured.

We brought the bird back to the school to treat it. 
Luckily, the injury wasn't that bad.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Thank you. But…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
This is the room of a trainer working at this school… isn't it? 
Are you sure it's ok for us to be here?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh! Is that so!?
choice_data_list: I even have the badge on me…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Badge? ah… I see. 
So that's what this was.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I definitely thought it was something people wore these days 
for fashion. So that's why everyone wore them…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I want to thank you for helping Daruma-san. 
Can you come with me?
She grabbed my hand, and was taking me to somewhere.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Phew… what a pleasant evening breeze.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
This is the place where the best wind blows 
in the school. You can feel the most refreshing 
breeze during this season, at this time.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The warm wind becomes a gentle cool breeze as the sun goes 
down… It makes you feel very relaxed… doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
It's an auspicious wind. 
I'm happy to hear that.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I often come here whenever the wind blows. 
If the leaf stays swaying, it's a Hiyori Hiyori.
choice_data_list: I'm sorry… what are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …Oh? But didn't you understand what I was saying before?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Isn't that why you looked for me, and helped Daruma-san…?

I never understood a single thing. Daruma-san and Shinato, 
and other stuff about wind. I didn't understand any of it.
But…
choice_data_list: I just knew you were in trouble
I just knew you were in trouble

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear…! So you went out of your way to find me 
even when you didn't understand what I was saying?…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu… You are a very strange person. 
But just as I felt, you are a person of a very triumphant wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for everything today. If it's fine by you, 
Please come and see me running next time. Until then―

Free and elusive… an Uma Musume like the wind. 
That was my first impression of Yamanin Zephyr.
